org.jasig.portlet.courseschedule.mvc.portlet

Class LocationColorCodes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.portlet.courseschedule.mvc.portlet.LocationColorCodes

  • public final class LocationColorCodes
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps locations to color codes for the Grid View.
    Author:
    Drew Wills, drew@unicon.net
